DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate efficacy safety DA-8031 decide optimal dose DA-8031 male patient premature ejaculation oral administration on-demand . The investigator hypothesize newly-developed DA-8031 would effect delay ejaculation patient premature ejaculation ( PE ) . Design : Placebo-controlled , Randomized , Double-blind , Double-dummy , Parallel group , Fixed dose design
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Evaluate Efficacy Safety DA-8031 Male Patients With Premature Ejaculation
DOC.criteria: Male patient age premature ejaculation 6 month . PEDT score ≥ 11 IIEFEF domain ≤ 21 Serum Creatinine ≥ 2.5 mg/dl AST , ALT > 3*Upper limit normal Subjects hypotension ( SBP/DBP < 90/50mmHg ) uncontrolled hypertension ( SBP/DBP > 180/100mmHg ) Subjects chronic depression , psychiatric schizophrenia , Subjects alcohol , drug substance abuse
